quotes.quote: If there is a book that you want to read, but it hasn't been written yet, you must be the one to write it.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison, c/o 1953

quotes.quote: Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston, c/o 1920

quotes.quote: The knowledge I have now is not the knowledge I had then.
quotes.author: Kwame Ture, c/o 1964

quotes.quote: There's always something to suggest that you'll never be who you wanted to be. Your choice is to take it or keep on moving.
quotes.author: Phylicia RashƒÅd , c/o 1970
